text.div: "mRS 0-2 at 90 days" is an outcome, defined by a CQL expression, used in expressing what an Evidence is about.

name: ModifiedRankinScaleScore02At90DaysAfterTreatment
title: Modified Rankin Scale score 0-2 at 90 days after treatment
description: Modified Rankin Scale score 0-2 at 90 days after treatment

definitionExpression.expression: ["Observation": code in "75859-9|LOINC"] mRS where mRS.value between 0 and 2
